messages.ssml: <speak>According to the Center for Disease Control and Prevention, you should avoid close contact with people and especially those who are sick. Close contact is considered being within about 6 feet or having direct contact with infectious secretions of a <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> case (for example, being coughed on). This is especially important for people who are at higher risk of getting very sick.</speak>
